characterDescription:
Jost is a darkeyed Alethi farmer living in Hearthstone and senior amongst those boys of his status. His father was a soldier who told his son that he'd won a Shardblade and was cheated out of it.
While Kaladin lived in Hearthstone, Kaladin also asked Jost to teach him to use a spear. Jost declined, saying that it wasn't right.
Jost, nevertheless, felt threatened by Kaladin, and accused him of wanting to make his (Jost's) father sound like a fool, and him (Jost) sound stupid.
